name: Jumping Sh*t 64
description:
This game was created for LowRezJam 2020! It is my first game created for any game jam. It has resolution 64x64 pixels and it features my own pixel-art graphics (which is horrible, btw).

The game is about a jumping sh*t, which tries to fight his way back where it came from (the toilet). The game consists of 9 levels, 3 locations - 3 levels per each location. Also, four difficulty levels are available. The locations are:

  1. The Wastecanals
  2. The Pipes
  3. Almost there

There is a secret in every level, try find them all! Those secrets are memes, excuse the meme quality, I'm not a good memer!

Controls:

  • A, D / left, right arrow - moving
  • space / W / up arrow - jumping

Used tools:

  • Godot Engine
  • LibreSprite
  • Gimp
  • Pixelate a PNG
